name: Colors of the Universe
description:
What does the inner world of a note look like? Explore a microscopic world of chords by diving into the infinitely small. You can wander aimlessly and get lost in the emerging harmonies. Or maybe there is a path to find, somewhere, leading into a whole new microcosm?

This game was made during the Ludum Dare 48 jam, which theme was “Deeper and deeper”.

If you're wondering: yes, there is an ending! But you'll have to find it by yourself.

Assets

Sounds samples are from:

  • Stamperadam https://freesound.org/people/stamperadam/ (Licence)
  • Freepats Project http://freepats.zenvoid.org/
  • Philarmonia Orchestra https://philharmonia.co.uk/resources/sound-samples/ (Licence)
  • No Budget Orchestra https://github.com/ssj71/No-Budget-Orchestra (Licence)
  •  VSCO 2 Community Edition http://vis.versilstudios.net/vsco-2.html (Licence)
  • Karoryfer Lecolds https://www.karoryfer.com/karoryfer-samples

Font used is Comic Neue
